Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.abstract: The size of the image in the PDF document

Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.name: sizeFit
Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.abstract: Defines how the image will fit if not enough space is given

Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.name: options
Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.abstract: Options used for changing the image before drawing

Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.name: cornerRadius
Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.abstract: Optional corner radius, is used if the options are set.

Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.abstract: Initializer to create a PDF image element.

Classes/PDFImage.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFImage.abstract: Creates a new PDFImage with the same properties

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:space:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds a empty space in the given container, between the previous and the next element

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: addLineSeparator(_:style:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds a horizontal line spearator to the given container. The line starts at the left indentation and ends at the right indentation.

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:image:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds an image to the given container.

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:imagesInRow:spacing:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds an image row to the given container.

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:text:lineSpacing:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Shorthand function to add a String text to the given container

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:textObject:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds an text object to the given container

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:attributedText:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Shorthand function to add a attributed String text to the given container

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:attributedTextObject:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds an attributed text object to the given container

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: set(_:font:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Set font in given container. This text color will be used when adding a PDFSimpleText

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: resetFont(_:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Reset text color in given container to default.

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: set(_:textColor:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Set text color in given container. This text color will be used when adding a PDFSimpleText

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: resetTextColor(_:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Reset text color in given container to default.

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:table:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds a table object to the document in the defined container

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: add(_:list:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Adds a list object to the document in the defined container

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: set(_:indentation:left:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Change the indentation in a container, use the parameter left to define from which side.

Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.name: set(_:absoluteOffset:)
Classes/PDFGroup.html#/s:5TPPDF8PDFGroup.abstract: Change the absolute top offset in a container

Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html#/s:5TPP.name: pages
Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html#/s:5TPP.abstract: Array of page indicies which should be included from external documents

Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html#/s:5TPP.name: init(url:pages:)
Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html#/s:5TPP.abstract: Creates a new instance using the given url to locate and the pages parameter to select the pages.

Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html#/s:5TPP.name: init(url:pages:)
Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html#/s:5TPP.abstract: Creates a new instance using the given url to locate and the pages parameter to select the pages.

Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html.name: PDFExternalDocument
Classes/PDFExternalDocument.html.abstract: Document object used for including an external PDF document

Classes/PDFImage.html.name: PDFImage
Classes/PDFImage.html.abstract: Image element for the PDF document. Contains all information about an image, including the caption.

Classes/PDFGenerator.html.name: PDFGenerator
Classes/PDFGenerator.html.abstract: Factory which converts a document into a PDF file

Classes/PDFMultiDocumentGenerator.html.name: PDFMultiDocumentGenerator
Classes/PDFMultiDocumentGenerator.html.abstract: Generates a PDF from multiple PDFDocument by appending them.

Classes/PDFTable.html.name: PDFTable
Classes/PDFTable.html.abstract: A table is a two dimensional list.

Classes/PDFTableColumn.html.name: PDFTableColumn
Classes/PDFTableColumn.html.abstract: Reference to a single column of cells in a PDFTable

Classes/PDFTableRow.html.name: PDFTableRow
Classes/PDFTableRow.html.abstract: Reference to a single row of cells in a PDFTable

Classes/PDFTableSection.html.name: PDFTableSection
Classes/PDFTableSection.html.abstract: Reference to multiple rows and columns in a PDFTable

Classes/PDFAttributedText.html.name: PDFAttributedText
Classes/PDFAttributedText.html.abstract: Attributed text objects hold an instance of NSAttributedString

Classes/PDFSimpleText.html.name: PDFSimpleText
Classes/PDFSimpleText.html.abstract: Text and spacing of a text object.

Classes.html#/s:5TPPDF15PDFRenderObjectC.name: PDFRenderObject
Classes.html#/s:5TPPDF15PDFRenderObjectC.abstract: All renderable objects subclass from this object.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
